Tharil'zun

Bring Tharil'zun's Head to Marshal Marris in Redridge.
Tharil'zun's Head
  •  
 Suggested Players [2]

Description

Blackrock Outrunners and Renegades are running ambushes between here and Stonewatch Keep. The leader of the Outrunners is an orc named Tharil'zun--we want this orc. Bring me the head of Tharil'zun!

Reward

You can choose one of these awards:
Fire Hardened Buckler
Orc Crusher

Progress

Orc pressure from Blackrock is still tense. But have you at least rid us of Tharil'zun?

Completion

Tharil'zun was a vicious, crafty orc. Well done - I'm sure he didn't go down easy. Here is your reward, <name>.

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 2550 Experience
  • 150 Reputation with Stormwind
